description.head: A floating pragma is set.
description.tail: It is recommended to make a conscious choice on what version of Solidity is used for compilation. Currently multiple versions "^0.5.5" are allowed.

description.head: Local variable shadows a state variable.
description.tail: The local variable "_totalSupply" in contract "DummyERC20Token" shadows the state variable with the same name "_totalSupply" in contract "ERC20Token".

description.head: Potential denial-of-service if block gas limit is reached.
description.tail: A storage modification is executed in a loop. Be aware that the transaction may fail to execute if the loop is unbounded and the necessary gas exceeds the block gas limit.

description.head: Unused state variable "ONLY_OWNER_ERROR_SELECTOR"
description.tail: The state variable "ONLY_OWNER_ERROR_SELECTOR" is created within the contract "LibOwnableRichErrors" but does not seem to be used anywhere.

description.head: Unused state variable "TRANSFER_OWNER_TO_ZERO_ERROR_BYTES"
description.tail: The state variable "TRANSFER_OWNER_TO_ZERO_ERROR_BYTES" is created within the contract "LibOwnableRichErrors" but does not seem to be used anywhere.
